price: Basi kimbilieni kwa Mwenyezi Mungu, hakika mimi ni mwonyaji kwenu wa kubainisha nitokae kwake.
arabic: فَفِرُّوٓاْ إِلَى ٱللَّهِۖ إِنِّي لَكُم مِّنۡهُ نَذِيرٞ مُّبِينٞ
footnotes: Basi fanyeni haraka kuendea kwenye ut'iifu wa Mwenyezi Mungu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: fafirrū ilā al-lahi innī lakum min'hu nadhīrun mubīnun
